content: **sign up for my mailing list at https //view flodesk com/pages/63d4ba29de520bd60dc33f80** -this free sea otter family pattern is available on my blog you can also find the premium pdf pattern if you prefer which is available in english in us terminology -this pattern is beginner friendly it is recommended that you are familiar with the basic stitches -follow me on instagram @curiouspapaya for the latest updates
